name: Blood Bastion
description:
You're a vampire without a bastion, your life is drained by the sun.
Exchange what remains of your life to regain your Castle and vanquish your rival.

Please play in fullscreen as 

Watch out, you don't have a lot of time before you run out of blood !
You can custom the inputs in the Control Menu !

Made in 72h for the Ludum Dare 44 Jam. Theme: "Life is currency"


Default Controls:
  • Arrows to move
  • W to use knife
  • X to dash
  • C to use protection
  • M to mute music
  • In the menu: Arrows to navigate, Enter to select, Escape to go back
